message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120, which is the price I've seen it for elsewhere.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $160. This is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but $160 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. That's as high as I'm willing to go.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I'm willing to make one more offer. I'll give you a deal at $155, which is still a good compromise considering the product's value. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
